txt.en: The abandoned mines of Sundergrót still hold valuable ore and treasures, ripe for the taking. However, the goblin intruders stand in your way….\n\nYour mission is to find and defeat Dufnazt, a goblin commander in Sundergrót.
You have been tasked with defeating the goblin commander in Sundergrót.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'The abandoned mine Sundergrót has been overrun with goblins. The scouts believe that they are being led by a commander loyal to Gorgar. I task you with entering Sundergrót, locating this goblin commander, and defeating him! The rest of the rabble will quickly become disorganized, and be easily dispatched by our forces!'
Complete Mission: The Goblins for Gorgar
Your mission is to defeat Dufnazt, a goblin commander in Sundergrót.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Sundergrót,
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!
'Well done! With their commander defeated, the rest of those cowardly goblins will likely flee the mines! We have struck a great blow to Gorgar's army!'
The monster commander in this mission will attempt a brutal wounding attack.
